title: Airborne, explained
description:
What do we mean when we say “airborne?”; plus, the most important unanswered questions about how coronavirus is transmitted.

FEATURING
Roxanne Khamsi @rkhamsi
Brian Resnick @B_resnick

LINKS
They Say Coronavirus Isn't Airborne—but It's Definitely Borne By Air

The 9 most important unanswered questions about Covid-19

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.
